title: having the error 0xc000005 on my league of legends and it wont let me open the game up
body: Hey, i am unable to play the game because of an error called 0xc000005, I request some help please :D

replies.body:
This may be due to a security problem that's blocked from reading files so it can't find it.  Try out the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get that restored.

Once complete, you may need to force a repatch through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to make sure your game files are in good health.  I hope that helps!

Thanks very much, i am going to try it ASAP.
Thanks for your time reading this :D
